Package org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa

Class Determinization

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.fsa.Determinization
public class Determinization
extends java.lang.Object
This class collects several methods for the determinization of a finite state automaton.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.lang.String NBW2DBWAlgorithmKey
    The option key of the algorithm applied in the conversion from NBW to DBW.
    static java.lang.String NBW2DBWBK09
    The key of the BK09 algorithm.
    static java.lang.String NBW2DBWLandweber
    The key of the Landweber algorithm.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static FSA toDBWByBK09​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DCW by the approach in [BK09].
    static FSA toDBWByDEK07​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent WDBW if any equivalent WDBW exists.
    static FSA toDBWByLandweber​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DMW by the approach in [Lan69].
    static FSA toDFW​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an NFW to an equivalent DFW.
    static FSA toDPWByPiterman​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DPW by Safra-Piterman construction with default options.
    static FSA toDPWByPiterman​(FSA aut, Properties options)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DPW by Safra-Piterman construction with custom options.
    static FSA toDRWByModifiedSafra​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the modified Safra's construction with default options.
    static FSA toDRWByModifiedSafra​(FSA aut, Properties options)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the modified Safra's construction with custom options.
    static FSA toDRWByMS​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the Muller-Schupp construction.
    static FSA toDRWBySafra​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the Safra's construction with default options.
    static FSA toDRWBySafra​(FSA aut, Properties options)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the Safra's construction with custom options.
    static FSA toWDBWByDEK07​(FSA aut)
    Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent WDBW if any equivalent WDBW exists.

    • toDRWBySafra

      public static FSA toDRWBySafra​(FSA aut)
      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent DRW by the Safra's construction with default options.
      Parameters:
      aut - an NBW
      Returns:
      an equivalent DRW
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if aut is not an NBW
      See Also:
      SafraConverter.NBW2DRW(FSA)

    • toDBWByLandweber

      public static FSA toDBWByLandweber​(FSA aut) throws UnsupportedException
      Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DMW by the approach in [Lan69].
      Parameters:
      aut - a finite state automaton
      Returns:
      a DBW equivalent to aut
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the automaton aut is not convertible to an equivalent NBW
      UnsupportedException - if any intermediate conversion is not supported or the source automaton is not equivalent to any DBW
      See Also:
      FSA2DBWByLandweber

    • toDBWByBK09

      public static FSA toDBWByBK09​(FSA aut) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, UnsupportedException
      Determinizes an FSA to an equivalent DBW through DCW by the approach in [BK09].
      Parameters:
      aut - a finite state automaton convertible to an equivalent NBW
      Returns:
      a DBW equivalent to aut
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the automaton aut is not convertible to an equivalent NBW
      UnsupportedException - if any intermediate conversion is not supported or the source automaton is not equivalent to any DBW
      See Also:
      FSA2DBWByBK09

    • toDBWByDEK07

      public static FSA toDBWByDEK07​(FSA aut) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent WDBW if any equivalent WDBW exists.
      Parameters:
      aut - an NBW
      Returns:
      an equivalent WDBW
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input automaton is not an NBW or no equivalent WDBW exists

    • toWDBWByDEK07

      public static FSA toWDBWByDEK07​(FSA aut) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Determinizes an NBW to an equivalent WDBW if any equivalent WDBW exists.
      Parameters:
      aut - an NBW
      Returns:
      an equivalent WDBW
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input automaton is not an NBW or no equivalent WDBW exists
